page.title: 05The Factory Estate
page.content: The factory estate is situated around Fircroft Way, Edenbridge. There are about 25 factories in the estate; employing approximately 1300 people, ranging from 6 to 300 people employed in a factory. The oldest factory (40 years) produces cable trunking for electricity and telephones. A recently opened factory deals with the storing and selling of steel. Others deal with Electric motors Staplers,Photographic prints,Signs, Surveying equipment etc. The raw materials used by the factories are as follows: Steel 10 factories, Aluminium 8,Paper 4,PVC 3,Timber,Glass,Varnishes, Chemicals & Brass 2,and Pollygropellen, Polystyrene,Pigments,Ink,Iron,Sand, Plasics,Soda-ash and Limestone 1. Products from the factories are sent worldwide; Australia, South America,the Far and near East, and Europe.
